data.text:
@Roman_Weeb Exuding Chad energy Augustus
-makes confusing ass statement
-refuses to elaborate
-quote tweet something that "didn't happen"
-gets blocked
@UglyRhubarb @fishfis92249764 @AliceAIvt @Roman_Weeb Your video is ready. Do you want it removed? contact @/LuisMayoV https://t.co/dOa1fyE5S5

@Roman_Weeb btw Baidu is Chinese wikipedia. But the full story isn't concret. Yu Kamiya did mention on Twitter hat it was banned but from the Chinese pov, it seem to be a case of kadokawa self censor. 

But ultimately, this is old news so it's impossible to fact check anything.

@Roman_Weeb iirc, China eventually allowed it to be sold from 2019 or something after the movie. Back when it was first censored, I wasn't intelligent enough to go balls deep to dissect the exact reason but according to Baidu, Taiwan's Kadokawa dropped it due to self-censorship.
@AliceAIvt @Roman_Weeb the chinese fucking your mom formula
